markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Standard">[Downpour](/Spells.aspx?ID=417)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Water" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=165" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 391 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Domain**
[Water](/Domains.aspx?ID=35)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 120 feet

**Area** 30-foot burst

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You call forth a torrential downpour, which extinguishes nonmagical flames. Creatures in the area are [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) and gain fire resistance 10. Creatures outside the area are concealed to those inside the area. Creatures with weakness to water that end their turns in the area take damage equal to their weakness.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The fire resistance increases by 2.
name: Downpour

text: Downpour Source Core Rulebook pg. 391 4.0 Domain Water Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Range 120 feet Area 30-foot burst Duration 1 minute --- You call forth a torrential downpour, which extinguishes nonmagical flames. Creatures in the area are concealed and gain fire resistance 10. Creatures outside the area are concealed to those inside the area. Creatures with weakness to water that end their turns in the area take damage equal to their weakness. --- Heightened (+1) The fire resistance increases by 2.
